RTCPeerConnectionIceconnectionstatechang.summary:
An iceconnectionstatechange event is sent to an object each time the {{Glossary("ICE")}} connection state changes during the negotiation process.
The new ICE connection state is available in the object's property.

remarks.para: One common task performed by the iceconnectionstatechange event listener is to trigger ICE restart when the state changes to failed.
This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
